doc_table_formula.doc_column_not_found: Document report template column not found

advertising_law_violation.title: Information on violations of the law on advertising
advertising_law_violation.placedAds: Number of studies (monitoring) of compliance of placed (distributed) advertisements with the legislation on advertising
advertising_law_violation.learningMonitoring: Number of violations detected during the monitoring
advertising_law_violation.deficiency: Number of cases initiated and instructions given on the deficiencies
advertising_law_violation.basedOMJtK: Number of statements made on the basis of ALС
advertising_law_violation.fineDecisions: The number of decisions on the payment of fines
advertising_law_violation.fineDenied: Number of rulings rejected on the application of fines

analysis_result.title: Results of analysis of commodity and financial markets
analysis_result.name: Name

appeals_consideration.title: Information on citizens' appeals in the context of the results of their consideration and channels of treatment (by phone, in writing, through the website, by e-mail)
appeals_consideration.name: Names

areas_appeal.title: Analysis of consumer complaints by industries

brand_and_finance_reestr.title: State register of economic entities holding a dominant position in the commodity or financial market

competition_law_reestr.title: Register of state administration bodies, local government bodies, economic entities, including natural monopolies, that have violated the competition law
competition_law_reestr.enterpriseName: The name of the company in which the case was initiated
competition_law_reestr.document: Laws and regulations that led to the lawsuit

compliance_list.title: List of government bodies, local executive bodies and business entities that have implemented an antimonopoly compliance system
compliance_list.subjectName: LIST of state-owned enterprises where the antitrust compliance system will be implemented on an experimental basis from January 1, 2021

consent_transaction.title: Information on preliminary consent to conclude mergers and acquisitions of business entities and acquisition of shares in the authorized capital of business entities
consent_transaction.committeeName: Antimonopoly Committee of the Republic of Uzbekistan and ego territorial subdivisions
consent_transaction.add: 1. Number of applications for mergers and acquisitions.
consent_transaction.specialOne: 1.1 The decision of the special commission has been made.
consent_transaction.notRequiredOne: 1.2 A letter was sent that no consent is required
consent_transaction.share: 2. The number of applications for preliminary consent to purchase shares (stakes) in the authorized capital (authorized capital) of business entities
consent_transaction.notRequiredTwo: 2.2 A letter was sent that no consent is required

consumer_right_reestr.title: Register of business entities violating consumer rights and advertising legislation
consumer_right_reestr.time: The time when the status of the offense is determined

document_evaluation.title: The results of the assessment of the impact of regulatory legal acts on the competitive environment obtained by the Committee
document_evaluation.regionalOfficesName: The Committee and its regional offices
document_evaluation.total: The total number of bills considered (ex-ante)
document_evaluation.noObjection: No suggestions or objections to the project
document_evaluation.antiCompetitiveNumber: The number of anti-competitive norms in the project
document_evaluation.deficiency: The project was returned due to deficiencies and incomplete documentation

domestic_market_price.title: Statistical information on the results of the studies carried out at average prices for basic consumer goods in the domestic consumer market of the republic

enterprises_dominant_position.title: List of enterprises dominating the commodity and financial markets

entities_violate_competition.title: List of economic entities violating competition law
entities_violate_competition.subjectName: The name of the subject who committed the offense
entities_violate_competition.contentOfAction: The content of the action taken

explanation_and_warning.title: List of economic entities violating competition law
explanation_and_warning.name: Number of cases initiated and instructions given on the deficiencies
explanation_and_warning.mjtk: Number of statements made on the basis of ALС
explanation_and_warning.fine: The number of decisions on the payment of fines
explanation_and_warning.rejectedFine: Number of rulings rejected on the application of fines

non_compliant_brand.title: Information on the results of the test purchase and goods that do not meet the requirements of regulatory documents

product_price_quotation.title: Quotations of selling prices for products on commodity exchanges

property_information.title: Information about official motor vehicles, official housing and other immovable property at the disposal of state bodies and organizations (with the exception of things used in operational search, military and other special services).

public_authority.title: Information about the state and economic management body, local government authority (name, location, mode of operation, contact numbers for working with the population, official website, email address, name of the head, geography)

public_procurement_information.title: Information about public procurement, including goods (works, services) purchased by persons engaged in public procurement under direct contracts.
public_procurement_information.goodServiceName: Name of purchased goods and services
public_procurement_information.purchaseProcessType: Type of implementation of the procurement process
public_procurement_information.purchasePurpose: Purposes of procurement of goods (services) (for the central office / departmental organization)
public_procurement_information.goodUnit: Measurement unit of purchased goods (services) (if possible)
public_procurement_information.price: Unit price (tariff) for goods (services) under an agreement (contract)
public_procurement_information.totalAmount: Total quantitative (volumetric) value of purchased goods (services) (sum)
public_procurement_information.purchasedGood: The purchased goods (services) are fulfilled / not fulfilled
public_procurement_information.supplier: Name of the supplier of goods (services)

regions_product_price.title: Dynamics of market prices for certain types of food over the last 5-10 years (data on such types of food as sugar, flour, vegetable oil, eggs, etc.)

service_cost.title: Expenses for official business trips of officials and for the reception of guests who have arrived from abroad (the purpose of the business trip or visit, expenses for daily subsistence allowance, transport and accommodation (with the exception of state secrets and information intended for official use)
service_cost.name: FULL NAME

stock_competition_law.title: Information on compliance with antimonopoly legislation during trades and exchange tradings
stock_competition_law.across_region: The number of participants in tenders held in the regions of the country
stock_competition_law.across_region_deficiency: Hence the number of identified deficiencies
stock_competition_law.learn_purchase_deficiency: Hence the number of identified deficiencies

stock_product.title: List of highly liquid and monopolistic products for trading on commodity exchanges

subordinate_organization.title: Information on subordinate organizations, branches and regional divisions of the organization (name, location, mode of operation, contact numbers for working with the population, the official website, email address, name of the head, geolocation)
